summary: REQ-1 is partially implemented in ProgrammeSection.tsx with three day cards, themes, and schedules, but weekday labels appear incorrect for Day 2 and Day 3 (all set to FRIDAY) and one activity label differs from the specified text. REQ-2 (publishing to production) cannot be confirmed from the diff summary. The backend change adds an events CRUD/programme overview API that was not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Programme Overview must include correct weekday label for each day (May 1–3, 2026) and no incorrect weekday labels.
missing_requirements.reason: In the updated ProgrammeSection.tsx, all three days use weekday 'FRIDAY', which would make Day 2 and Day 3 incorrect.

missing_requirements.requirement: DAY 1 schedule activity label exactly matches: "10:00 AM – 3:00 PM Arrival".
missing_requirements.reason: DAY 1 uses activity text "Arrival of Participating Schools" instead of "Arrival".

missing_requirements.requirement: Publish/upload the updated Programme Overview so it is visible on the live production homepage without manual steps.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows code changes but does not include any deployment/publishing configuration or release mechanism evidence; production visibility cannot be verified from the provided diff summary.
evidence: <file-diff> summary shows only code file modifications: backend/main.mo, frontend/src/components/sections/ProgrammeSection.tsx, frontend-file-summaries.txt, project_state.json

hallucinated_features.description: Added backend CRUD API for events and programme overview retrieval/update (addEvent, updateEvent, deleteEvent, getEvent, getAllEvents, updateProgrammeOverview, getProgrammeOverview) with in-canister Map storage.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asked to update static homepage Programme Overview content and publish it; it did not request a backend events system, nor indicate the frontend should fetch programme content from the backend.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced a ProgrammeOverview type with events array and last_updated timestamp in the backend.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1/REQ-2 and not evidenced as necessary for publishing static homepage content.
